participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and supportive, enjoys sharing knowledge and helping others.
participant_1.background: I express myself through country music and tattoos. I don't have my own car, but I'm working on it! I love to ride bikes. My father is a retired police officer. I can beat anyone in chess.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Creative and practical, finds joy in solving problems and is dedicated to her craft.
participant_2.background: Last year, I found inspiration in the world and used it to help my clients with their taxes. My favorite thing to do is sleep. I am a seamstress from the Midwest. I am currently working on a project that involves bitcoins. My parents are very supportive and understanding, even though I'm not the best at managing my finances.

content.text: Good! What are you up to today?
Working on my taxes and some bitcoin stuff.
Hows that going? I cant help you with the taxes, but I might be able with the bitcoins!
Its going good! I just have to import my crypto transactions into TurboTax.
Oh! I have heard of that! I think I know how to do that.
Oh sweet! If you can help that would be amazing!
Of course! I am happy to help.
No problem! Let me know if you have any other questions!
